record.description: Waseda University Baseball team, left to right: T. Kubota, shortstop; T. Kato, left field; T. Halta, centerfield; T. Oshita, right field; M. Mijazaki; K. Tanaka, centerfield; G. Taniguchi, pitcher; C. Tobita, coach; Professor Iso Abe, Dean of College and manager; S. Takamatsu, first base and captain; J. Kuji, catcher; J. Nagano, catcher; F. Arita, pitcher; M. Komoni, centerfield; T. Taminaga, second base; K. Umekaura, 3rd base; J. Ishii, 3rd base.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
